articles.content:
Information Bulletin on Juche Idea Published in Italy 
    Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- The Italian Committee for the Study of the Songun Idea for Independence and Sovereignty published a special issue of an information bulletin titled "The Main Principle of Socialism and Juche Idea" on January 3.
 The bulletin said that the Juche idea which President Kim Il Sung fathered in the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and applied in the course of leading the Korean revolution is the most scientific one and its vitality was clearly proved during the Korean war fought against the U.S. Imperialists' aggression and in the struggle to build Korean-style socialism.    
 The Juche idea makes it possible to successfully defend socialism in Korea and consolidate it and preserve world peace and fully display the spirit of internationalism, it stressed.

Kim Hyong Gwon's Feats in Pioneering Songun Revolutionary Cause
articles.content:
Kim Hyong Gwon's Feats in Pioneering Songun Revolutionary Cause
    Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- Seventy years have passed since indomitable revolutionary fighter Kim Hyong Gwon, uncle of President Kim Il Sung, passed away (January 12).
 His revolutionary life and immortal exploits performed in the early period for realizing Songun cause are still alive in the minds of the Korean people.
 Kim Hyong Gwon devotedly fought to carry into practice the line of armed struggle advanced by the President in the early years of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.    
 He joined the Korean Revolutionary Army (KRA) which was formed by the President in July Juche 19 (1930). The President assigned  him, a commanding officer of the army, a task to conduct political work and armed activities in the homeland so as to rally anti-Japanese masses.
 In August that year, he, leading a small armed group of the KRA, crossed the River Amnok and arrived at Phabal-ri (at that time), Phungsan County, via Samsu and Phungso. He assaulted the police substation there and disposed of the Japanese chief of the substation who cruelly oppressed the local people.
 Upon hearing the gun report, many people gathered together. Then he made a speech before them, powerfully calling upon them to rise up with arms in their hands in firm unity, defeat the Japanese imperialists and retake the country.    
 His bold military and political activities at Phabal-ri stroke terror into Japanese imperialist aggressors. And then he gave one blow to enemies after another. He stormed key-points of enemies in the Riwon, Pukchong and Hongwon areas and wiped out them with flexible tactics.
 Through the devoted political and military activities conducted in accordance with the President's line of armed struggle, Kim Hyong Gwon made an undying contribution to the pioneering of the Juche-oriented Songun revolutionary cause and its victorious advance.

articles.title: Plan for Cooperation in Field of Standardization, Measuring Control between DPRK and Vietnam
articles.content:
Plan for Cooperation in Field of Standardization, Measuring and Quality Control Signed between DPRK and Vietnam
    Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- A plan for cooperation in the field of standardization, measuring and quality control for 2006 was signed in Hanoi on Jan. 10 between the DPRK State Bureau for Quality Control and the Council for Standardization and Quality of Vietnam.
 The signing ceremony was attended by members of a delegation of the bureau from the DPRK side and officials concerned of the council from the Vietnamese side.
